snippet.title: Ruffalo, Hawke, Peet in 'Real Men'
snippet.description: Plus: Greg Berlanti directing DC's ''Green Lantern'' movie, Grand Ole Opry star Porter Wagoner dead at 80, Cheryl Hines making directorial debut with Adrienne Shelly script, and more...

snippet.title: The 5 Year Plan
snippet.description: Meet Samantha's new boy toy on ''Sex and the City.'' Jason Lewis talks about his past, his present, and what he hopes for the future

snippet.title: Great Kate
snippet.description: With 'Hideous Kinky,' she confirms her maturity and her talent, says Lisa Schwarzbaum
